ygData.subject: Re: Stats on reinforced or studded leather
ygData.msgSnippet: Look at it from a Smith s point of view... It costs quite a bit (mostly time) to make both studs and boning (for reinforced), and it s much harder to recoupe
ygData.messageBody:
Look at it from a Smith's point of view... It costs quite a bit (mostly
time) to make both studs and boning (for reinforced), and it's much harder
to recoupe the money for them then it is for banded (remember those
failures?) Studs usually have to go for 1p each just to break even (less
for higher level smiths, but they don't want to waste the time). So, if
something takes 3 studs and leather, it's hardly worth it. Try to find a
smith that will make you some if you want some.

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server

> From: PRIMEhero@...
>
> In a message dated 6/19/99 3:50:31 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
> EQCheats@onelist.com writes:
>
> Drew Simonis wrote:
> Does anyone have these stats? I have been looking for these items, but
it
> seems that no one makes them! I would love to see the stats and determine
if
> my search is worth while. I would be willing to discard my quite common
> banded armor in favor of this if the AC were not too much lower, just for
the
> sake of RP'ing...
>
>
> Studded is handmade armor and actually not to commonly used from what
> I've asked people. Reinforced can normally be found on Druids in the
midlevel
> ranges before they get strong or wealthy enough to get better armor. Ask a
> few Druids in the mid teens what they are using and the stats if they
could
> as they are restricted to wearing no metal armor.
>
